# iosxr_ipsla_responder (Resource)

This resource can manage the IPSLA Responder configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_ipsla_responder" "example" {
  type_udp_ipv4 = [
    {
      address = "10.1.1.1"
      ports = [
        {
          port_number = 888
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
  twamp         = true
  twamp_timeout = 600
  twamp_light_sessions = [
    {
      session_id = 1
      local_ipv4_addresses = [
        {
          address    = "10.1.1.1"
          local_port = 862
          remote_ipv4_addresses = [
            {
              address     = "10.1.1.2"
              remote_port = "862"
              vrf         = "default"
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
      authentication = true
      encryption     = true
      timeout        = 3600
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `twamp` (Boolean) Setup TWAMP responder
- `twamp_light_sessions` (Attributes List) Test session ID (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--twamp_light_sessions))
- `twamp_timeout` (Number) Inactivity timeout period
  - Range: `1`-`604800`
- `type_udp_ipv4` (Attributes List) Permanent address on responder (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--type_udp_ipv4))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--twamp_light_sessions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `twamp_light_sessions`

Required:

- `session_id` (Number) Test session ID
  - Range: `1`-`65535`

Optional:

- `authentication` (Boolean) Authenticated test session
- `encryption` (Boolean) Encrypted test session
- `local_ipv4_addresses` (Attributes List) Enter IPv4 address of the local interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--twamp_light_sessions--local_ipv4_addresses))
- `local_ipv6_addresses` (Attributes List) Enter IPv6 address of the local interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--twamp_light_sessions--local_ipv6_addresses))
- `timeout` (Number) Duration for which session remains active (in seconds). Default is forever.
  - Range: `60`-`86400`

<a id="nestedatt--twamp_light_sessions--local_ipv4_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `twamp_light_sessions.local_ipv4_addresses`

Required:

- `address` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the local interface
- `local_port` (Number) Local UDP port
  - Range: `1`-`65535`

Optional:

- `remote_ipv4_addresses` (Attributes List) Enter IPv4 address of the remote interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--twamp_light_sessions--local_ipv4_addresses--remote_ipv4_addresses))

### Nested Schema for `twamp_light_sessions.local_ipv4_addresses.remote_ipv4_addresses`

Required:

- `address` (String) Enter IPv4 address of the remote interface
- `remote_port` (String) Remote UDP port
- `vrf` (String) VRF name for local-ip

Required:

- `address` (String) Enter IPv6 address of the remote interface
- `remote_port` (String) Remote UDP port

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_ipsla_responder.example ""
```
